data.description:
🏀 GYM CLASS is the top VR basketball and sports game. Experience NBA licensed team courts with full-court games, social parks for pickup games with friends, and football & baseball stadium games. Rated best on Quest - get the best simulation physics, environments, gameplay, avatars, and cosmetics in VR with GYM CLASS.

Download for free and enjoy:
🏈⚾ Sandbox: Play baseball, football, & other new activities.
🌍 Social Courts: Connect to the best community in epic environments.
➕ Physics Engine: Use real-life shooting, passing, dribbling in realtime, multiplayer games. Get superpowers w/ insane dunks too.
🤖 Game Modes: Multiplayer 2v2, 3v3, & 4v4 game modes & AI.
🎨 Design Your Look: Complete challenges to unlock cosmetics.
🏆 Stats & Matchmaking: Track your wins and improve your skills.

Get NBA Bundle to unlock:
😮 NBA team courts: Virtual replicas of all 30 NBA team courts.
👕 NBA team branded apparel: Two different sets of team-branded apparel, a team-branded basketball, and team-branded hat. Additional NBA & team-branded basketballs & accessories is available for purchase separately.
🏆 NBA Bundle Challenges: Play games to unlock NBA team features.

Get GC PRO to unlock: 
🏠 Private Courts: Exclusive spaces for you & friends. Customize your court, set your rules. It's your world.
👕 Nextgen Avatars: Design your player w/ max control. Hairstyles to facial features & height.
🎨 Cosmetics: Unlock a wide variety of cosmetics from skins, glasses, headphones, & even banana hats.
